episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and fascinating topics, including the hypothetical urine output of Godzilla, the real-life inspirations behind Long John Silver and Wendy Darling, the ineffectiveness of tinfoil hats in blocking brain signals, and the unusual flight behavior of geese.

facts.fact: If the new Godzilla existed, it would produce 12.9 million gallons of urine a day.
The real Long John Silver from Treasure Island was father to the real Wendy Darling from Peter Pan.
The tinfoil hats that conspiracy theorists wear in order to stop the government from sending messages into their brain actually does the opposite; it amplifies the signal.
Geese sometimes fly upside down to lose height quickly when they're coming into land, rather than doing a long, slow descent.
